website_summaries.verdict: A popular cat window perch that's loved as much by pet parents for its affordable price as it is by cats for its comfort. Basic, but perfectly functional.
pros: Despite the lightweight price tag, it still manages to hold a hefty 50 pounds of furry cuteness
Industrial strength suction cups and a sturdy reinforced plastic frame hold up well, even under the weight of multiple cats
Rugged polyester cover is fully removable and machine washable for hassle-free cleaning
cons: Hook-and-loop-secured cover attachments can loosen up from time to time and should be checked periodically

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: The product I purchased supposed to be the cat sunny seat window-mounted bed from Oster and I received the one from as seen on TV😡 That was false advertisement and it came from China. Everything smelled really bad like chemicals and the suction are yellowish. Aside from that it only held up 15 min (without a cat on it). Very bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Dat Truong

customer_reviews.title: HUGE hit for our furry family members!
customer_reviews.text: This cat window seat is AMAZING!! If you look at the picture I attached, it held one VERY large cat plus 5 foster kittens with no signs of wavering. It has let go from the window a few times but not a lot by any means. My cats also chew on the plastic anchor strings but so far they haven't been able to damage them too much. LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lora Silagy

customer_reviews.title: It keeps falling down.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sunny seats from different brands so that I could compare them. This one will not stay attached. It has fallen down multiple times everyday (we’ve had it up for 4 days). None of our cats will go near it anymore. The other window seat has stayed attached and has been used frequently. Pick a different sunny seat for your cats. This one is not worth the money. The one that worked for us was the cat window perch hammock cat bed.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but it works for our 9.5 lb cat. It took about 4 days of putting her on it and brushing her before she began using it on her own. She now only seems to leave it to eat and use the litter pan :) One suction cup came loose for 2 days in a row even though I had thoroughly cleaned the window and the cup. I believe that it was just "stiffer" than the others. If you have the same problem, I would suggest using a hair dryer to warm them before attaching them to the window.
customer_reviews.author: kmn

customer_reviews.title: Thought this would be the cat's meow
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was atrocious. Once the frame was put together it kept coming apart. Getting the brown hammock to slide over the sides was a real feat. Older people would want to get a handyman to get it on. The plastic guy lines were very difficult to get through the slits in the fabric. After cleaning the window and cups, it looked good. My 8 pound kitten freaked out when it came unstuck to the window, sending her grabbing on to whatever she could. Put it back up after cleaning cups and glass. about 20 minutes later it unattached again. Put it in a box and donated it to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: RevJayG

customer_reviews.title: Kitten wants to use it...but arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old ragdoll kitten wants nothing more than to use his new window mounted cat bed, however the bed will not support his weight (7lbs). One of the suction cups is deformed due to a manufacturing defect and it will not stick to any surface whatsoever. 4 working suction cups are needed to fully support the bed and all I received were 3 (plus the 1 deformed). Now my kitten cannot enjoy this product at all and I feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: SportsDoc

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So I guess this is an 'As Seen On TV' product. The product didn't come with actual instructions on how to assemble it but nothing a little brain power couldn't take care of. It seems to work well and sturdy for lounging & napping cats. The actual hammock material itself smelled really strong of a chemical smell, which isn't appealing. So I suggest washing it for your cats sake 🐱
customer_reviews.author: KatherineM760

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: bought this product twice.. first time bought this product lasted about 3 months..then gotten the 5x more expensive one which the cat like it better and more sturdy.. that one lasted 6 months.. disappointed, rebought this one thinking since both dont last very long, why not just by the cheaper one.. this one didnt even last a day. tried many times, clean the window, install it in the afternoon. maybe the problem has to do with the cold weather.. but I am done with it and since it is so cheap, not worth my time to repackage it and shipped it back
customer_reviews.author: tony ku

customer_reviews.title: Received crappy versions of this item
customer_reviews.text: Received crappy versions of this item. Were NOT presassembled, arrived with thin PVC, plastic "wiring" and misshapen suction cups. We tried putting the suction cups in boiling water to correct the shape, but to no avail, these were returned. I tried ordering one more time to see if I would receive the item advertised, and received the same crap.
customer_reviews.author: Kristal & Scott Beaudry

customer_reviews.title: I'm surprised...but it works!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, when I took this out of the package I was skeptical. I have a large (pleasingly plump) cat and the pvc-type poles, suction cups and plastic wires did not instill confidence. I dutifully cleaned my window, put the thing together, hung it up and put a couple of cat treats in it. Sure enough, 15 minutes later my cat was in it - all 15+ pounds of him. I'm a believer.
customer_reviews.author: emmi

customer_reviews.title: Wrong pieces!
customer_reviews.text: Was really looking forward to this but instead it came with the wrong pieces. It had two of the same corner. That only matters because the pieces have an up side and a down side and the wire is attached. So I couldn't even just assemble it *wrong* and use it. And I have heard nothing from my return/replacement/refund. Wasted money and left with nothing.
customer_reviews.author: R. LaFlamme

customer_reviews.title: Yup...2 versions and we got the crappy one!
customer_reviews.text: As many others here have expressed, there are 2 versions if this seat. One comes assembled in a large box, and the cables that hold the seat to the window are metal with a plastic cover. The other comes disassembled in a smaller box and is a low rent version if the other! Cables are plastic, PVC is super flimsy... I got the low rent version. I would bever have riskex my 17yr old cats safety with it. Returned it and did not want to play roulette with ordering another since they are only a couple bucks more at the store. With all the complaints you would think AMAZON would do a little quality control here....
customer_reviews.author: Mama Hags

customer_reviews.title: 6 months and the sides have torn out
customer_reviews.text: **update** the 2 purchased in January have already torn at the side seams, it seems as tho the product is being made cheaper than a few years ago. Aside from the blown out sides, the middle has NO support. Even for the price, I am disappointed. 2015 version has poorer suction cups as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Magoo

customer_reviews.title: Also the directions are in no way useful. --This is not worth $1--let alone $10
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. It will not stick to your window; it is unsafe for use because the suction cups do not stick to the window. I even cleaned the window and the suction cups to be sure. Also the directions are in no way useful. --This is not worth $1--let alone $10. It was a nice idea, but it is not made with quality pieces and is unsafe because it falls off the window on its own. If it falls off with 0 lbs of weight on it.. how will it ever stay up with a cat on it? :(
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: No more cushion smushin'
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves to sit on the top of my sofa cushions, and I'm no fan of him deflating my couch... or covering it in hair! I was skeptical of this one since it was cheaper than other ones. But proved me wrong. It has great suction and my cat loves laying on it in the sun. I did have to put him there a few times and pet him until he stayed. Now he goes right to it every day! Some people asked about chewing the wires. I notice he does this sometimes but not for long and hasn't even put a dent in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi M.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more for other windows.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and install. Our cat spends most of her day lounging in her new window seat. She might weigh 10 lbs. She even slept in it through a very loud thunderstorm one night last week. Attached it to the window on Christmas Eve day, checked it last night and the suction comes are still holding without any readjustment. That is with outside temp going from low 40s one day to high 60s the next.
customer_reviews.author: k922

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks. It claims it can hold up to 50 pounds, but it can’t even withstand a tenth of that. This thing couldn’t hold the weight of my 5 month old kitten. Even if he doesn’t go on it the suction cups eventually fail after a few hours. Don’t buy it, I’m returning mine.
customer_reviews.author: TheTruth

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Poorly constructed, the suction cups do not stick. Poor cats fell out of the window so many times even after screwing in the top braces to the wall above the window. No matter how clean, dry, wet or even boiled made these suction cups work, and I tried! Should note I got the smaller version 4x that has to be assembled. The wires that hold for support are made of a brittle plastic material. The video shows metal wires in that place.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny Champion

customer_reviews.title: Total Fail
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this product; in fact, I don't even know that this is the product that was advertised. The box is very different looking than what is shown in the picture, with "As Seen on TV" labeling. It came unassembled in the box, which is OK - but this just let me see the extremely cheap plastic PVC and cardboard tubing that constitutes its frame. I nevertheless put it together and stuck it to my window (even though I am strongly suspicious this was an already-returned item judging by the gunk that was on the included suction cups). It wouldn't even stay stuck on. Total fail. 100% returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed knock off
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these cabinets from the Amazon seller directly and then bought two more from Amazon it's self and buyer beware this is not the same cat bed it is a lower quality the strings are plastic so they're not like the braided nylon or metal that the other ones are and it seems like the plastic is also cheaper as well !! Disappointed that Amazon allows themselves to sell an inferior product but advertise it as being the same !
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: My LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Hector, in the pants suit, will meow at the window and poke the window seat until i put it up. Obviously they love to chew on and rub thier faces on the strings. Only down fall is that the bottom suction cups don't seem to hold as well as the top ones. They're a thicker kind of rubber and I'm afraid ill break my window if i push them any harder. But i just prop it up in the windowsiill and that hasn't been an issue for me. I usually have the window open way more than that, but its a cold day. I will most likely buy a second one ♡
customer_reviews.author: SarasaurusRex

customer_reviews.title: It's unbreakable
customer_reviews.text: Its been over a month now since I installed this on a window and it has not fallen down once even with my slightly overweight cat around 13 pounds laying in it most of the day every day. I didn't do anything fancy to hang it up, I simply pulled it out of the box, assembled it, cleaned the window and suction cups with window cleaner, installed it and its been fine ever since. It has also survived my cats unbreakable craving to chew on strings, she's always chewing on the two support strings and you can't feel/see any damage. Though if she somehow does manage to chew through them she'll regret it instantly, but I don't see that happening.
customer_reviews.author: herculeesjr

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable
customer_reviews.text: It took some time to get the suctions to hold right. (Clean glass, set at appropriate heights) once that was done, it was amazing. It's been in the same place for months. My cat is over 10 pounds and uses the clear cords holding the top suction cups to scratch his mouth and also bites it. It's been holding strong. It's his safe spot. His bed. He's never liked any cat bed I've gotten but him being in a higher spot seems to make him happy. My cat sleeps on this daily. I could not be more happy with the strength and durability. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Alderman

customer_reviews.title: Rocky loves this seat
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this a bit over a year. It has been on our slider since we purchased it and has not lost suction - and that’s with a 22 pound cat!! The only issue we have is the Velcro has lost its grip so I had to stitch along the tube. Could be the cat is too heavy but the description states to 50 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: mom of2 boys

customer_reviews.title: Pain to set up, but kitty couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Getting everything set up from cleaning the glass to fitting the whole thing together was terrible. HOWEVER, my kitty LOVES. THIS. THING. She jumps up and down from it a lot and we've only had a cup fall off once and the whole thing still stayed up. You may need to work at it a little, but it's well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Must have for indoor cats!
customer_reviews.text: My two cats absolutely love these! The windows in my old apartment had perches they could sunbathe on but the windows in my house don’t. So I ordered one of these hoping they could use it to get some sun. They loved it so much that they started fighting over who could sit on it and I had to buy another one! It took me a few tries to get them to stick but if you wet the suction cups a little and then push them until you hear the air release they stick. I’ve had the first one on for about a month and a half and it hasn’t moved.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Blake

customer_reviews.title: Broke my window!!!
customer_reviews.text: I followed instructions cleaning my window and the suction cups. I pushed on the bottom suction cups. I did not apply excessive force and my window broke! It was less than 10 years old, and double-paned (the instructions gave a list of window types not to use and my type was NOT listed). I have pushed harder on this window cleaning it or cleaning tape off it. I'm seriously pissed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loooooves this hammock. My cat doesnt usually like hammock type products but loves this perch. The material is rough (like a plastic weave), but that's easily solved by putting a blanket/throw on top. This is my cat's favorite place to sleep! I worried this would not feel secure enough or fall off the window which originally kept me from purchasing but it's been a few weeks and it seems extremely sturdy (my cat is 9lbs and jumps up on it).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.

customer_reviews.title: This product really works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Midnight my cat has been on this bed since it came 4 hours ago. I have sliders across the entire back of my home. So I got 2 of these. He loves it........................just loves it................I don't know if he will ever come down. ha ha. I am waiting to see if the suction holds on the window. If it does, then you have a great product..............All the money we spend on our cats and most don't work. But this one works. Get this one for sure.............it works, and your cat will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: My 2 kiddos are obsessed with this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I never review products but I had to for this one! The bed was super easy to put together and stick to the window (I would recommend running the suction cups under hot water for 30sec or so to soften them up if they feel stiff). My 2 cats immediately loved it! So far it has been strong enough to hold both of them (they're about 7lb each). If my kiddos can't learn to share I'll have to buy a second one (they are both on the bed in my picture, a little hard to see them b/c they are both black). Good quality, easy to assemble, and works as advertised; I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time getting this to stick to our windows! I would think it was on and out of no where it would fall, sometimes with the cat in it. Good idea, just needs more suction. My cat liked it until he fell a few too many times!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Swalls

customer_reviews.title: I thought this would be great for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be great for my cat, it ended up not working out so well. We washed the window and the cups prior to attempting to hang. Things seemed great, until he jumped up. He managed to lay there for a little bit, maybe twenty minute, before one of the cups gave and dumped the poor baby on the floor. He's under 15 pounds, so I don't think the problem is the cat. We tried again with the same results. Someone told me to rub the cup on skin to get a little bit of natural oil on there, but that didn't seem to work either.
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: Stay away. A piece of crap.
customer_reviews.text: 50 lbs? Perhaps 50 lbs of air would work.......oh, maybe not. Because our 10 pound cat broke it in its first use. The suction cups don't stay on (and yes, we cleaned the window and lightly lightly dampened the cups) but they slid down nonetheless. Even when it stayed, the cat jumped up and the seat became detached from the device, making it broken/unusable. Flush your money down the toilet, this is junk. Pure junk.
customer_reviews.author: peapodgrrl

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups are not compatible with cat perches...
customer_reviews.text: I should have spent the extra $10.00 and bought one of the seats that rest on the windowsill. This seat is useless: the suction cups detach from the window randomly and every time my petite 7.4 lb. cat crawls (not even jumps) into it, at least one of the suction cups falls off of the glass. I just took it down because I don't want her to get hurt when it inevitably falls. I followed the instructions for installation and hints to make the suction cups adhere better to no avail. Spring for a higher quality seat for your fur babies!
customer_reviews.author: KDub522

customer_reviews.title: Product is nothing like what is shown, JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, doesn't look anything like what is pictured. What are shown as metal cables, are just cheap stiff plastic on what was received. They don't even hang correctly as they hold there shape from being folded in the box--so they don't extend to offer support. Doesn't say Oster anywhere on it, just stuffed in a small white box lots of parts with assembly required. Yet it clearly states installs in "seconds". Sent it back got a replacement same junk again. This is NOT as shown.
customer_reviews.author: reg noms

customer_reviews.title: My cats didn't like it, then it broke after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: Each of my cats tried this and didn't seem to like it. One of them made a second attempt and the PVC broke. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle in Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Will forever buy this product!!! Kitties rate it 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed 5 YEARS ago. My cat, Melvin, absolutely loves it. He has spent HOURS in this bed every single day since I bought it. It just recently ripped (after 5 years) so I came back to buy the exact same one!! He’s carrying a little extra weight and this bed has never failed him. He also tends to chew on the cords and they’ve never snapped. I will forever keep buying this bed for my kitties. It lasted me 5 years, with heavy use and 4 moves.. fantastic buy!!
customer_reviews.author: JET

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay very well.
customer_reviews.text: Well. My cats absolutely loved this, when it would stay on the window and actualy hold them. The suction cups would randomly fall off all the time we stopped putting it back up after awhile because I didn't want my 14lb cat falling from the window. It did work very well at first but after awhile it just started not working hardly at all.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: One of my two cats loves it.
customer_reviews.text: If my cat isn’t by my side when I’m home. I would always find her sitting on this in the window. My other cat however doesn’t care much at all for this and he is one usually always in the window. it was an easy setup, took like 5 mins to follow the directions and have it hanging. So your cat might love it or not. Only one way to find out.
customer_reviews.author: sarge

customer_reviews.title: Alex Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat Alex very much enjoys his new window bed. We had one before. But it was much heavier, kept peeling off the velcro, and falling didn't take more than twice of that sudden fall for him to stop jumping & laying on it. The suction cups seem very heavy duty & now and then when my wife or I walk by the window we always check them, give the cups a press to ensure a grip. We added a old sweat shirt that our cat liked to lay on to help get him used to it, build a little trust with it and more cozy & warm for him the up coming winter months.
customer_reviews.author: mike Buckalew

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these. I had to completely remake both. I had to sew the seams on the seat, hot glue in places, replace the velcro and reinforce the plastic pipes with duct tape. It's very cheaply made, BUT if you have some time and duct tape it can be made into something that will hold a 15 lb. cat without a problem. I didn't want to spend a lot on something my cats might not use. Once I knew they liked it, I was able to fix the problems.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I was totally skeptical on if this was going to work or not. How could a few suctioncups hold this thing to a window, and support the weight of a cat?! Well color me impressed, it works as intended! It’s never fallen, and we take it down every evening and put it back up in the morning. My cat also loves she can watch the backyard from a new vantage point on our sliding glass door.
customer_reviews.author: Primeaddicted

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty large cat, he weighs about 20 pounds and he fits on this thing with no problem. It holds his weight and stays put on the window glass. My cat used to lay in the bed all of the time, but now he is almost always in this hammock. I purchased this about 3 months ago and it is still holding up. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive the item that was advertised. Got a product without the "Oster" label on it at all.
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive the item that was advertised. The cables are a cheap plastic not the wire shown and the box was just a cardboard box, not the one in the picture. Might have received a knockoff, either way I am returning it. Update: Yeah after looking more into it I did not receive the right item at all. They shipped me a "Sunny Seat" with roughly the same design but the cables are cheap-o stuff. Also the instructions/box/EVERYTHING did not say Oster at all! I feel bad for the product by Oster reviewing it so harshly, but with amazon shipping out knockoffs under their name I feel this must be done.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wojciechowski

customer_reviews.title: Works fine if suction cups are properly applied to window
customer_reviews.text: Cat likes it, not sure he'd like it as much without the Amazon Basics Padded Pet Bolster Bed we have on it though. I would prefer it to fit somehow onto the window ledge so the cat could be in front of the screen and get the fresh air. Mine doesn't nibble on the plastic cord, but he has rubbed his jowls on them making me worry. It has held a cat up to 14 pounds and I'm pretty confident if the suction cups are properly applied that it would hold an even larger cat.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to this new spot for my cat
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Sturdy AND my cat already loves it and it was delivered only an hour ago. Update one week later: this is the first place I look for my cat in the morning. She will be semi-active in the morning but settles down around noon when the sun starts hitting the window. We put a blanket on it for warmth in the mornings, and I think it has attracted to it even more now. Overall, sturdy product that holds my 12lb fluff ball of a cat. Look forward to owning and reordering for the rest of my cat owning life.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Brown

customer_reviews.title: The Suction Cups are not made well. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited for this product when I ordered it for my girlfriends cats' birthday. However when I opened it, the issues began. The suction cups are horrible. Right off the bat they were non uniform in the circular part that attaches to the window. Huge quality control fail. However I continued on. Cleaned the window, let it dry, all the setup. When I stuck it on the window, after about 10 minutes (no cat) one of the suctions ( the most deformed) fell then 5 minutes later another. Then the whole thing fell on its own with the weight of air. Retried over and over with the same results. The cat and I are very disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: If you have a cat you need this!!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat spends most of his day in this either sleeping or just looking out of the window.....he LOVES it!!! My only issue is of the 2 suction cups only one stays stuck, regardless of what I do the other one keeps coming unstuck. Our cat is able to use it although we keep it low in case it falls. If both stuck this would be a fantastic product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CMills

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and secure, favourite cat place
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have any problem setting it up and it's been sturdy every window I've put it. I've had it on three windows and never had a problem. Use basic sense when applying a suction cup and all will be well. We bought this for our kitten at 9 weeks old as seen in the photo. He is now 7 months old and about 8.5 pounds and the thing is just as sturdy. We have a little warming crinkle cat blanket on it and he's as happy as a cat-clam on it. We ended up leaving it on the window facing the driveway and when I come home for lunch - there he is!
customer_reviews.author: Kepler

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this!! They love it so much, that I often find 2 cats in one hammock (even though I have purchased a second one)! I was worried that it wouldn't be able to hold the weight of 2 cats, but even as they're growing, it shows no sign of falling down. In the 5 months that I've had this hammock, it hasn't fallen once! I really like how the cover slips on, so when the Velcro comes undone, it's still strong enough to hold them. Do your kitties a favor, and buy them this hammock!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: The pictures are misleading
customer_reviews.text: While it works, it is not as pictured. It's like a cheaper version of the one I expected to get. The lines that attach to the suction cups are plastic not metal as I expected. One of my cats has already started chewing on it so we'll see how long it lasts. The frame is not solid PVC it's a flimsier plastic. Putting it together was a bit of a pain, wedging in the plastic piece that goes into the suction cup required the help of a butter knife. Change the pictures to reflect the product you're selling.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S

customer_reviews.title: Good cat seat
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fair window seat for the price - my cat loves it and spends most of her day sunbathing on it. It's made of plastic pipes with a stiff polyester (or similar) material that wraps onto the pipes that acts as the seat. The industrial strength suction cups work fine, just make sure to clean them + the spot they're going on very well first. I'd say it's a fine cat seat if you don't want to spend a lot but overall I'd probably prefer a more upgraded one in the future, this doesn't look like it's going to last too long.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: ... first time I ordered this product - it was great, I still have it and it's awesome
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this product - it was great, I still have it and it's awesome. The second one I ordered - not so much. It came packaged in a different box. This one is not made well. The suction cups don't stick at all and fell multiple times before it was even used. The material made to cover the bed portion is stiff and uncomfortable. This product doesn't work.. I wish I could find the one I originally ordered - because I've had that one for years. The "as seen on TV" version is poorly made and shouldn't be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Numberninetyfive

customer_reviews.title: Nice hammock
customer_reviews.text: My cat is huge, and he can jump into this hammock. I positioned it high on a sliding glass door so my cat can see over my balcony, and he loves it. He has to jump on a desk and two shelves to get there, but it's the only exercise my fatty gets. It's never fallen or slipped, but I recommend cleaning the glass and suction cups with alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: Nia Ball

customer_reviews.title: One of the suction cups came warped
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I missed the window for returning this. Now I'm stuck with a cat bed that can't be used. One of the suction cups seems slightly warped at the edge and so it isn't sticking. Very disappointed. Looked like a great bed!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie P Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and one of them is very strong. He will rip through a toy in a day easy! I've had this product for about 4 months now and the plastic string part is still in tact! He bites it and tugs on it super hard every day and all that it did was leave small bite marks. I was worried he would cut through this in a day bc he did it for a toy with a similar plastic string. Im lazy and don't leave reviews often but I would recommend this 200%. My two cats love being on it and napping!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Shon

customer_reviews.title: Both cats love it. They fight over it but can both ...
customer_reviews.text: Both cats love it. They fight over it but can both easily lay in it together. I have one 15lb cat and 11lb cat. Caution: if you cats like cords or rubber, the bungees will attract them. Both cats liked chewing on the rubber wires so I had to wrap them in fabric with a hot glue gun. No problems since
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: The cat likes it...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this for the window. My cat likes to sleep in an odd area of the house. I thought something off the floor would make her more comfortable. She truly likes this new bed. And it seems to be constructed well enough that she can't easily rip it apart. I can't tell you how well the suction works, I screwed it to a wall.
customer_reviews.author: I. Tremaine

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have looked for years and debated spending over a hundred dollars on a cat tree when I happened upon this product in a search. My cats are also very happy with this product and quite enjoy sunning themselves right in our window. I love that this product does not take up floor space in our already tiny home. When you first put the product on the window I recommend putting a little water on the suction cups so that it sticks well and check the weight you can put on it before letting your pets use it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Grabher

customer_reviews.title: Required some alterations to make more sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Seat did not have enough Velcro on it. There was a small pieces on each side and none in middle which made it sag a lot in the center. My cat would not get it it however i would not have either if i was a cat. It felt unstable. (My cat weighs 6#) I sewed a long strip of Velcro the length of side that closes around the frame and now my cat loves it. She watches and chatters to the birds all day.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well to daily use
customer_reviews.text: After 2.5 years, the top suction cups finally let go. I think they've been damaged by too much UV and aren't holding well anymore, but until now, I have never had to reposition them at all. One of my cats used this daily for about a year, stopped for awhile, and then picked it up again. For an inexpensive window seat, I think it's held up well, and I have no issue with buying a new one. I don't think the canvas cover is that nice, so I folded a little blanket on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Leia1979

customer_reviews.title: Good cat hangout
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put up in the window and my cat LOVES it. He gets to silently judge everyone as they walk by his house. It's pretty....flimsy seeming to me so I don't entirely trust it, but so far it has held up. I wish that it was designed with hinges, because if you have horizontal sliding windows and vertical blinds like I do, it kind of gets in the way and it's a pain to unsuction it if I want total privacy.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed... I really had high hopes this would be a great little seat for my cats but I don't feel like it's made all that well. It's not a complete waste of money but I received the sunny seat that was in the white box!!! I just read a ton of reviews about not getting the correct seat. I'm not sure if I got the right seat or not but its ok. It's worth 15.00 my cats love it and I haven't had any suction problems yet. My one cat is pretty fat she's about 14-16 lbs and my other cat is on the slender side about 10-12 lbs I'll update later
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 month old kitten who is almost ten pounds. I know he’s going to be a big boy so I was looking for something that will hold his adult weight. I know very well that suction cups only have so much suction before they release, so I will be checking them regularly so It doesn’t traumatize my cat. But so far he loves it. The bed is bigger than what I expected so he’ll be able to grow into it. It’s amazing how small some cat towers and beds are. My cat loves it. Perfect for a nice long cat nap.
customer_reviews.author: Ezer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed because my cats love to look outside but so ...
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay stuck to the window, i cleaned the window, i cleaned the suction cups. My cat isnt even on it and it falls off. Disappointed because my cats love to look outside but so far they can't even get on it without it falling. They are not big cats they are well under the 50lb limit
customer_reviews.author: Ana Cuchetto

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth the cheap price
customer_reviews.text: It was so cheap I thought I would at least give it a try, but it really isn't worth anything. I could get 3 of the suction cups to stick to the window, but one would not stick no matter what I tried, so I finally gave up and tossed the whole thing. The one time I did get it set up my cats ended up knocking it off the window by rubbing against it, if they had just jumped into it I think it might have stayed, but it wouldn't stay with the rubbing, so for me (and the cats) it was a no go the whole way around.
customer_reviews.author: Sprinter Fan

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it! It is pretty large which is great because one of cats is pretty large as you can see from the video. I do recommend measuring your window area before purchasing because there is only one window this will fit on in our house. My cats love watching for birds or critters outside or for napping or for playing with toys my kids attached to the top.
customer_reviews.author: sb9876

customer_reviews.title: Its good but
customer_reviews.text: My one cat loves it. He is only 6 months old though and will get bigger. The velcro keeps letting go on the fabric. Im going to have to sew it. Besides that, he chews on the wire holding it up and it hasnt broken which is good. I probably wouldnt buy this again i would just spend the money on a really good one. It was hard to put together. The fabric barely fit on.
customer_reviews.author: JessTK

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This window seat is great so far! The set-up was extremely easy. I made sure to clean the window and suction cups very well before placing it on the window, and even stacked up books on it before placing my kitty onto it. Sturdy so far! Giving it 4 stars only because I have not had the product very long and cannot attest to the longevity. One thing I would suggest is placing some sort of blanket or pillow on the seat for more comfort. The material reminds me of those foldable lawn chairs, and just doesn't seem the comfiest for my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in a year
customer_reviews.text: My cat enjoyed the sunny seat for nearly a year before it became unusable. The seat fabric is very thin and it ripped right at a seam. The suction cups weren't working as well either, they would dump my poor cat on the floor occasionally. I've since upgraded to the Kitty Kot which is light years ahead of this thing. Everything is sturdier. Better suction cups, better fabric, better frame, etc. It's more expensive but looks like it will list much longer than a year. Don't waste your money on the Sunny Seat.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.P.I.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Both my cats love their Sunny Seats! I have two seats and they are in different windows. My two cats pile up in one seat then move to the other - 'cause where one goes, the other has to follow. It does a great job of staying put...the suction cups are great! Easy to assemble. Easy to install. Easy to remove and install elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: GA Peach

customer_reviews.title: I got another person's returned item.. Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The item I got was another person's returned product. How did I know? The box I received it in was a plain white box with no brand labeling, image, or anything else like the image shows. Not only that, but one side of the box was open when I received it, with the very cheap product half-stuffed inside messily. as I pulled out the item, I did not see any instructions or Oster papers, but instead, only the previous purchaser's return slip! The mixed reviews lead me to believe that there may be a quality product here... If you get lucky. However, I would not waste my time again to possibly get another poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Cat window seat
customer_reviews.text: My one cat loves this to bird watch. My other cat is building up to jumping on it. Once they are both on it they love it. It was a little hard to put together with the plastic so I had my son help and he had it together in no time. I put the bed up with some soap on the suction cups and they work really well. Not sure how long it will last since my kittens like to chew on the plastic arms.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: My first cat likes it so much I have to buy another one!
customer_reviews.text: Cat #1 loves to look out the window and though it took a little bit of time to adjust, definitely enjoys the window bed now. Adopted cat #2, she LOVES it and hogs it up all the time, so I'm buying a second one! The suction pads slipped a few times when they were new (doesn't help that cat #1 is a monster and likes to chew plastic, so he was messing with them) but now that they are established I have not had any problems with it falling or slipping. I put a little cat bed on it for added padding but they use it without as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn Evans

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for cats who like to look out the window ...
customer_reviews.text: Blanche loves this and hangs out in it all the time. It's perfect for cats who like to look out the window / look down at the peasants in the room. It's only fallen off the window a couple of times, so I'd say it's pretty steady. It's not that difficult to put together but I did have some trouble with the plastic cords at first... Maybe some explicit directions, with photos, would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Ainsley

customer_reviews.title: She doesn't like feeling unsupported on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: It sticks to a window well if you've cleaned it off first. I did have to re-clean a spot with windex and jam the suction cup on before it would really stay. My cat is about 10 lbs and is still getting used to the seat. She doesn't like feeling unsupported on the bottom. The cloth sinks in when she steps on it and I think that instability frightens her. The velcro on the inside bar doesn't stick well so the cloth feels a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: buyingstuffffff

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, disappointing
customer_reviews.text: First off, the seat fabric is torn. Second, there are no instructions. Once you get it together, it is extremely cheap and flimsy. The website says it can hold 50lbs. The box itself says two different things. One side says holds 30lbs and the other side says no more than 20lbs. Very misleading. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Martin

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried my cat (Who is a pretty big boy) wouldn't like it but to my pleasant surprise he absolutely ADORES it! He would refuse to leave it once I set it up. I put an old fleece blanket in it to make him more comfy and he likes it even more! Easy to assemble (Even with missing directions, whoops!) and surprisingly stable. I received the one with the metal (?) cables to support it. All in all a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Finn

customer_reviews.title: Poor mounting design
customer_reviews.text: It was impossible to insert the mounting cable in the hole in the upper mounting suction cup. I tried for a couple of weeks to make this work and by the time I realized it would not work, the "window" of return had closed. The "window" for giving the product an appropriate and accurate review has not passed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Durdin

customer_reviews.title: Got all the parts.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a utuber so that's how I got my instructions. But I can't get it to stay up. Washed windows like it suggested. But it doesn't hold well. And if you live in a small apartment, it's hard to find the right place. And then unfortunately I can't shut the blinds. So It's a good idea for some but not for all.
customer_reviews.author: LBHurley

customer_reviews.title: Boil the suction cups!
customer_reviews.text: After assembly, I was very tempted to take it apart and return it back to amazon. It just felt flimsy and the suction cups were awful. Read a few more reviews and one of the tip was to put the suction cups in boiling water to soften it. Did just that and I was able to get it on the window. The cat got on it a couple of times and I don’t like he likes the feeling that it’s not solid under his feet. I put a piece of cardboard on top of the seat and a light blanket on top of that and now he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Omgitsconnie

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my cats were not about this. It’s possible they are too old now and set in their ways, or maybe the wires attaching it to the window are awkwardly in their way, regardless I think I’ll give it to a friend with a younger cat and see how she likes it. Overall it’s not a bad idea and also seems to stick pretty well as long as you clean the areas thoroughly before hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Cats are a lot like toddlers...
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that cats are a lot like toddlers. You buy them something nice and are excited to show them. Then, once it's opened, they play with the box and chew on the instructions. We have a sphynx and a siamese and neither will stay in it for very long or get in the seat without being placed. The seat seems well constructed and has been attached to the window for several weeks now. I'd recommend the seat, maybe your cat will actually enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this so much i bought three!
customer_reviews.text: Listen. Yes he’s spoiled. He has three of these. Captain jack is missing an eye and can’t go outside but loves to watch the birds. He’s also too fat to fit in the window sill. This was the perfect solution. He has them in different windows and will spend all day in them. He’s almost 20 pounds and we haven’t had an issue with suction or falling. I have had them over a year. Recommend Times 100!!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Bad suction = Not Safe for your cat
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and unfortunately threw away the packaging almost immediately thinking this should be just fine especially based on all the positive reviews. My cat really enjoyed sitting on this but it would not hold. She is 11 lbs. It was quite a fall and the way she fell one time her leg got trapped between the window and the seat. The suction just doesn't hold. My fault for not providing my cat with something safer and more stable. I'm annoyed and recommend if you really want to buy it and try it please keep the original packaging in case you want to return and save your money towards a better window seat.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: A must for indoor cats!
customer_reviews.text: ANYBODY WITH CATS SHOULD HAVE AT LEAST ONE OF THESE!!!!!!! (Especially indoor cats.) I have two in my front window. (I have 2 cats.) The cats love to watch the birds and to soak up the sun with their Sunny Seat Window-Mounted beds!!! (When they were small, they even cuddled together on one seat! Now that they are older, they both use their own seat.) Zero complaints about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. This is very cheap. It doesn't always want to stay suctioned. My cats are afraid to go in it because it did lose suction while she was in it. She is 8 pounds, and I did clean the window before attaching. Wouldn't recommend. Cat mom of 6 - tried many products, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Keri H.

customer_reviews.title: It holds my 8lb cat that jumps off it like a piece of furniture and my 14lb cats loves ...
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous at first as the suction cups popped right off the window, but I wiped both window and suction cups off with vinegar and water (what I clean my windows with,) and they have stayed out ever since, even in our sub-zero temps. It holds my 8lb cat that jumps off it like a piece of furniture and my 14lb cats loves it so much I had to buy her one of her own. I even gave it as a gift in a pet gift exchange and they loved it! This is the best removable cat window seat out there. Don't be scared off by the great price!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Her favorite spot; decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. It holds strong in my window. I don’t exactly like the material of the hammock or the hard pvc piping so I threw down a fuzzy blanket. It’s one of her favorite spots in the house! Does not come assembled but fairly easy to put together. I believe I had instructions but could honestly figure it out without them.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: It Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: Read some reviews that the plastic wire is the "cheap" version of this product, but, that's the one I got. And so far it's holing my 13lb cat plus his heated blanket for a few days now.. I'll come back and edit this review if my cat comes crashing down anytime soon. Edit: Cat loves to chew and rub his face on the plastic wire; bed refuses to give in. He uses this bed 20hrs a day (not exaggerating) So I'll say this: Buy it and it should work. Even if it's the cheaper model.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Kovac

customer_reviews.title: This is really awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves laying on this as the sun shines through the window. She evens likes to sleep on it at night. i was afraid the suction would not be strong enough, but I have had this over a year, moved it multiple times, and the suction has not faltered even once. If you have a cat, this is a must-have.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble the cats have enjoyed it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so far. I have three cats, only two of them have attempted to get on it. They love the material and it’s easy to clean. Because it’s cold next to the window they’re not really sitting next to it as much. So I put my plants on it for a while. Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Winky

customer_reviews.title: Hard to review, never used.
customer_reviews.text: I'm probably not the best to review this product for the fact that it was a waste of money for me. Didn't really fit my window well and cat didn't use it. I'm sure if your cat likes to lay by the window this is a plus. As for quality I wasn't very impressed with what i saw and felt. Dont let my review be your conscious decision.
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: I thought my cat would enjoy this more then he does
customer_reviews.text: I thought my cat would enjoy this more then he does. I think it may be the material of the seat. I'm considering a fuzzy blanket or furry pillow case. I was impressed with the power of the suction cups..they really do hang on there..even with my 16lb cat hopping around finding his right spot.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay up. Falls with no weight. ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not stay up. Falls with no weight. Tried cleaning window and suction cups and still falls down in a matter of minutes with NO WEIGHT APPLIED. This is not safe for pets. My kitten is 5 pounds so it should hold but taking it down so she doesn't fall. Do not buy this. Buy in store as the one I first bought is slightly different and has plastic cords with darker canvas.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly9158

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have For Kitties
customer_reviews.text: My cats think this seat was sent from heaven. They can both sit on it at once and look out our bay window. It fits our MaineCoon and tabby and has not fallen with them in the seat. Occasional maintenance is required of cleaning and re-sticking the suction cups. It has held up for over two years and still continues to be our cats fav seat in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Miller

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Horrible buy. You shouldn't need to try this hard to make a product work.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Great when you finally get it together
customer_reviews.text: Had my son not been visiting I would never have gotten this put together. Also the suction only worked when we finally wetted the cups. Since then it has been suctioned on the window for months now. The cat absolutely LOVES it and they have these for the cats at the humane society where I volunteer as well. Highly recommend for cat lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't stick to the window at all. I cleaned the window and everything, so I'm thinking my window isn't defective. Must just be bad luck. I expected better thanks to all the amazing reviews. Plus it's was kind of a pain to assemble because it didn't offer any assembly instructions. It wasn't that hard to figure out, don't get me wrong, but when all was said and done, mine was all warped and crooked and I couldn't tell if that's how it was supposed to look or if I had done something wrong because, hey, I was just guessing at how to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Beebs

customer_reviews.title: My 4 felines approve
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 of these for my 4 cats...I’m extremely impressed, my very svelte Maine Coon who weighs about 25lbs enjoys lounging in the sun while saying a little prayer to the creators of this amazing bit of kitty heaven. We have them stacked and very securely suctioned to the sliding glass door for sunning, tree frog stalking and bug watching. We check the suction cups every few days since my girls seem to enjoy sleeping piled together on one bed, about 23lbs of femine felines total(guesstimating since we don’t discuss their weight). I’m purchasing yet another one for my daughter’s ESA cat can enjoy people watching from her dorm window.
customer_reviews.author: infantrywife

product_meta.title: Oster Sunny Seat Window-Mounted Cat Bed, 50 Pounds
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Give your cat a front-row view of nature, weather, people, and more without taking up valuable floor space with the Oster Sunny Seat Window-Mounted Cat Bed. Featuring industrial-strength suction cups that hold up to 50 pounds, this window-mounted cat bed installs in seconds to glass windows or doors. This elevated pet bed is perfect for cats that like to bask in the warm sun or active cats that desire a high vantage point. Great for multiple cat households, this cat bed helps reduce separation anxiety and keep messy hair off your furniture. It features a reinforced high-grade plastic frame that offers reliable, long-lasting use and a durable Oxford-style polyester cover that is built to withstand scratching. The cover is also machine washable for easy cleaning.
feature_bullets: Window-mounted cat bed gives your cat a front view of nature without taking up valuable floor space (retail box may vary)
Industrial-strength suction cups hold up to 50 lbs.
Installs in seconds to glass windows or doors
Reinforced high-grade plastic frame for long-lasting durability
Durable polyester cover is removable and machine washable (pillow not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars6,528 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
